name: Iron Dungeon
storyline:
Iron Dungeon combines a twin-stick shooter and a 2d platformer seasoned with roguelike elements.

Buried under the ruins of civilization, the underground military complex has awakened and resumed the production of combat clones.
Take control of one of the clones, explore the complex's premises in search of dozens of weapons and upgrades, fight enemies, and make your way to the surface to find out if there is still life on Earth!

Standing still is dangerous!
Dodge bullets and aim well to survive! Do not spare your enemies because you will receive precious shards that can be spent on improvements by defeating them.

Show precision and skill!
Activate platforms and jump boosters that will help you get to the most inaccessible corners of the underground maze to get the most valuable items.

You must always find out which maze you will find yourself in next!
Dozens of random items await you to help you survive and advance further. However, if you die, you must start from the beginning. And yes, no meta-progression, just your skill, and a little luck!
summary: Iron Dungeon combines a twin-stick shooter, a 2d platformer, and a roguelite. Explore a dangerous underground complex searching for dozens of weapons, gadgets, and upgrades to find a way to the surface and discover if there is still life on Earth!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Unleash Your Inner Warrior: Conquer the Iron Dungeon - The Ultimate Adventure Game!
